com.google.thingbrowser.api
Class AbstractThingResolver

java.lang.Object
  com.google.thingbrowser.api.AbstractThingResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThingResolver
Direct Known Subclasses:
MovieResolver, StickyResolver, UrlRetrievalMimeThingResolver
public abstract class AbstractThingResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThingResolver

A simple abstract implementation of ThingResolver.

A subclass must define the root URL, and is then responsible only for creating a Thing given a suffix string added to the root URL by implementing #newThing(String). Previously constructed Things are weakly cached by this class for subsequent use.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new AbstractThingResolver that handles a URL space rooted at a specified root URL.
